title: Thai fish cakes with a crunchy cucumber and carrot salad
description: Hot, salty, sweet and sour are balanced perfectly in this classic dish. Equipment and preparation: You will need a food processor and a julienne peeler or spiraliser.
ingredients: 450g/1lb skinless white fish fillets (such as ling, haddock or cod), bones removed
good handful of fresh coriander, roughly chopped
1 red chilli, deseeded and finely chopped
1 thumb-sized piece of fresh root ginger, peeled and finely chopped
sweet chilli dipping sauce, to serve
1 carrot, peeled and sliced into spaghetti-like strands using a julienne peeler or spiraliser
1 cucumber, sliced into spaghetti-like strands using a julienne peeler or spiraliser
